column4: where are the fortune files/database stored? I see the forune is in /usr/games but I guess there should be some text/files/database somewhere from which fortune read's them and display
/usr/share/games/fortune. This is where fortune stores its database files. fortune will randomly select one of those files to pick a quote.
oh, so that was a folder! :)
the text that rolls on your screen in recovery or normal boot mode, are different anyhow. "text"option in grub is all there is.
